item.title: Azure Landscape
item.description: This powerpoint presentation of various tiers in Microsoft Azure Cloud implementation. With the architecture in-place, I want to answer the question “How can you leverage Generative AI to build and maintain this infrastructure?” This is an embedded Microsoft Office presentation, powered by Office. Full PowerPoint presentation
